bib_record.title: Cross-sections for the 63,65,natCu(gamma,np) reactions in the giant dipole resonance region.

free_txt: Engl. translation of YK,1994,3,1994.
The (gamma,np)  reaction  cross  section  evaluation
using the subtraction procedure:  sig(gamma,np) =
sig((gamma,n) + (gamma,np))  -  sig(gamma,n)  for
corrected  initial cross sections published
by Fultz and Sund.
The  comparison of  the various photonuclear  reaction
cross section  data for  Cu-63,nat  published earlier
and the detailed analysis of conditions in which they
have  been obtained was carried out.  To overcome the
disagreements between the results of various  authors
the   new   initial  data  mormalization  and  energy
calibration procedures were proposed  for  difference
method of Cu-63(gamma,np)   reaction   cross  section
determination.  The data obtained for  this  reaction
were  used  for  evaluation of new cross section data
for Cu-65,nat (gamma,np) reactions.
Mean root-square errors are given.
by V.V.Varlamov.
